actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs, S. Rept. 94-1230.

official_title: A bill authorizing the extension of the American Canal at El Paso, Tex.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to construct, operate, and maintain the American Canal extension at El Paso, Texas. Authorizes the appropriation of $21,714,000 for fiscal year 1978 and thereafter for construction of such project.

titles.title: A bill authorizing the extension of the American Canal at El Paso, Tex.
